messages.messageBody:
Yes. Tony-san is right. They did use the same armor.

>From: "Anthony J. Bryant" <ajbryant@...>
>Reply-To: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com
>To: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Samurai Archers
>Date: Mon, 25 Jul 2005 15:52:09 -0500
>
>ninjabattle wrote:
>
> > Did samurai archers wear the same armor as regular samurai?
>
>
>In general, yes. Considering, especially, that samurai were first archers
>before
>anything else, of course.
>
>Later, archer corps might have had less expensive gear but in general it
>was the
>same stuff.
>
>
>Tony

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Samurai Archers
messages.msgSnippet: ... In general, yes. Considering, especially, that samurai were first archers before anything else, of course. Later, archer corps might have had less
messages.messageBody:
ninjabattle wrote:

> Did samurai archers wear the same armor as regular samurai?


In general, yes. Considering, especially, that samurai were first archers before
anything else, of course.

Later, archer corps might have had less expensive gear but in general it was the
same stuff.


Tony
--

Anthony J. Bryant
